title: STAT+: Prasad overruled FDA staff to reject Moderna’s flu vaccine application
description: The rejection is the latest instance of Vinay Prasad overruling career FDA scientists to place vaccines under harsher scrutiny.
content: The rejection is the latest instance of Vinay Prasad overruling career FDA scientists to place vaccines under harsher scrutiny.
